alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 10:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central La Paz and Maricopa Counties through 1145 PM MST... At 1056 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Congress to 8 miles southeast of Aguila to 14 miles northwest of Tonopah. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wickenburg, Aguila, Wenden, Gladden and Salome. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 60 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
